thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 09 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SolarEdge Enters UPS Market With Agreement To Acquire Gamatronic

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SolarEdge Enters UPS Market With Agreement To Acquire Gamatronic
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Solaredge Technologies Inc:
* SOLAREDGE ENTERS UPS MARKET WITH AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE GAMATRONIC, A UPS TECHNOLOGY LEADER
* SOLAREDGE ENTERS UPS MARKET WITH AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE GAMATRONIC, A UPS TECHNOLOGY LEADER
* SOLAREDGE TECHNOLOGIES INC - PURCHASING SUBSTANTIALLY ALL OF GAMATRONIC’S ASSETS, INCLUDING ITS INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY, BRAND, AND TANGIBLE ASSETS
* SOLAREDGE TECHNOLOGIES INC - UPON CLOSING OF AGREEMENT, ABOUT 100 OF GAMATRONIC’S EMPLOYEES WILL BE REHIRED AS SOLAREDGE EMPLOYEES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
